extensionDescription.message: An open-source extension to generate masked email addresses using Quick Aliases.

clickToCopyTooltip.description: Tooltip instruction for Copying Masked Email Address.

generateEmailTooltip.description: Tooltip instruction for Generating Masked Email Address.

copySuccessToast.description: Toast success message for copying masked email address.

shortcodeAddedToast.description: Toast success title for adding shortcode.

invalidEmailFormatToastDesc.message: Please enter a valid email format.
invalidEmailFormatToastDesc.description: Toast error description for invalid email format.

invalidEmailDomainToastDesc.description: Toast error description for invalid email domain.

emailFormatUpdatedToast.description: Toast success title for updating email format.

saveEmailFormatTooltip.description: Tooltip instruction for saving email format.

excludeListDescLine1.message: List of urls to exclude from showing autofill button.

excludeListDescLine2.message: One url per line. Supports wildcards.
